    • Constructor Detail

      • Amphora

        public Amphora​(java.lang.String color)
        Constructor for the amphora class
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the amphora Precondition: color != null && color is either ["BLUE","BROWN","RED","GREEN","YELLOW","PURPLE"] Postcondition: A new amphora tile object will be created.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmphoraPoints

        public static int getAmphoraPoints​(int numOfDistinctColors)
        Accessor function which returns the points to award if a player has [@numOfDistinctColors] distinct colors of amphora tiles in hand.
        Parameters:
        numOfDistinctColors - The number of distinct colors of amphoras
        Returns:
        The points to award Precondition: numOfDistinctColors is either [3,4,5,6] Postcondition: A valid number of points will be returned
